Summary: object was a bright, mirror like sphere with legs protruding at a 45 degree angle.object ascended then descended then vanished
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in South Haven
There were no other sightings in South Haven on or around August 29th 2011
divs: Sighting Detailsi was travelling north with my daughter on 196 and 31... 4 miles north of I94. We saw a mrror like sphere with protruding legs at 45 degree angle. the objext ascended gradually, moved to the east, then descended in a S shape motion. The object then vanished. The sighting lasted about 2 minutes.
